p:
According to the World Health Organization (WHO), viral diseases continue to emerge and each one represents a serious issue public health matter. In recent decades, several viral epidemics have occurred, such as the severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS‐CoV) between 2002 and 2003, H1N1 influenza in 2009 and, most recently, the Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS‐CoV) that arose in Saudi Arabia in 2012.
